name: Temporal Bifurcation Event
description:
Temporal Bifurcation Event

When the fabric of time is threatened, only one hero can save us all from utter chaos.

Temporal Bifurcation Event is a 2D pixel action game. 

Play for free ! Tips appreciated :)

Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 "Let There Be Chaos!"
https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-6

Controls

Use your arrows keys to move, and  X to attack.

Tips

You need to capture the entire trail of flowers behind a butterfly before your attack will land.
